attributes.action: make financial institutions show the true cost of loans, loan protection insurance and their commission
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Introduce regulations that require all financial institutions and intermediaries to: -
1.explicitly show all of the separate elements that are contained within a loan agreement e.g. interest rate on the loan, cost of the insurance, commission earned on the insurance (can be as high as 75%!), total cost over the loan period
2.highlight in bold the exclusions in respect of loan protection insurance and require them to state why they are recommending the product be taken out with the loan for that particular customer
3. require them to NOT automatically include loan protection insurance

rejection.details:
